1.text: FIRST PC If you run the current code you will receive a wrong greeting: 'hey stranger', correct the code to display your name in the greeting.
hints: think about how the objects are saved

2.text: SWITCHER It would be nice to have some light on, right? Create a function that changes text to binary code.

3.text: DRAWER Create a function that can check if a word contains only unique characters. If you make this work the drawer will open.

7.text: dummy description 7 SHOULD OPEN EXIT DOOR
